name: eashan
message:
well written ..dave …but im working behind a corporate firewall/behind a proxy…and my map app made following the above instructions only shows a grid view without map..the zoom function works. there’s no problem with the api key..
the logcat shows me error…
couldn’t get connection factory client..which seems to an api bug..
and publisher closed input channel or error occurred..
any help would be appreciated……im stuck with this problem for days and cant find a solution….besides that i have also ..tried running the app on different
platforms…like 2.2,11,14,in the all the above net works..through the settings on emulator ….but not the app
